attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please can the government decide either to tax a vehicle for:
EMISSIONS,
ENGINE CC OR THE AGE OF THE VEHICLE.
 THIS SYSTEM IS SO COMPLICATED PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHAT THEIR VEHICLE TAX WILL BE

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
